[h1] Look for this feature in the bottom menu of the game! [/h1] This mod will allow you to better navigate the characteristics of the apparels of your modpack. You can evaluate any apparels, even if it is not on your map.
[h1] Left click to apparel for open info tab from vanilla [/h1]
Note that the filtering happens from left to right.
